meanings.definition: Lack of sensitivity or awareness towards the feelings of others.
meanings.sent1: Her insensitivity towards her friend's emotions hurt their relationship.
meanings.sent2: His insensitivity to others' pain made him seem uncaring.
meanings.sent3: The insensitivity of the robot to human emotions led to some comical misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: The insensitivity of the storm to the fragile flowers left a trail of destruction.
meanings.sent5: The insensitivity of the rock to the chisel made it a difficult material to sculpt.
